targets.expr:
(sum by (handler) (http_requests_total{handler!="/metrics", handler!="none", status=~"2.*"}) * 100) /
sum by (handler) (http_requests_total{handler!="/metrics", handler!="none"})
sum by(handler) (http_requests_total{handler!~"/metrics|none", status=~"4.*", job="megapi-log"}) / sum by(handler) (requests_total{handler!~"/metrics|none"})

panels.title: Count Users registered in past 7 days

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS unique_user_count
FROM openl3_computation_log;

panels.title: Model's total average response time in ms

targets.rawSql:
SELECT datetime, error_message
FROM openl3_computation_log
WHERE error_message IS NOT NULL
LIMIT 3;

WITH daily_data AS (
  SELECT 
    datetime::date AS date,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE response_time_ms > 0) AS count_with_response,
    SUM(CASE WHEN response_time_ms > 0 THEN response_time_ms ELSE 0 END) / 
      COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE response_time_ms > 0) AS avg_response_time
  FROM openl3_computation_log
  WHERE datetime >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '5 days'
  GROUP BY DATE(datetime)
),
final_data AS (
  SELECT 
    date,
    CASE 
      WHEN count_with_response = 0 THEN NULL 
      ELSE avg_response_time 
    END AS avg_response_time
  FROM daily_data
)
SELECT * FROM final_data
ORDER BY date DESC;

panels.title: number of times music-cnn has been used
number of times music-cnn endpoint failed

targets.rawSql:
WITH daily_data AS (
    SELECT 
        TO_CHAR(datetime, 'Day') AS day_name,
        AVG(response_time_ms) AS avg_response_time_ms,
        COUNT(*) AS count_logs
    FROM 
        openl3_computation_log
    WHERE 
        datetime >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days'
    GROUP BY 
        TO_CHAR(datetime, 'Day')
),
all_days AS (
    SELECT 
        TO_CHAR(d.ts, 'Day') AS day_name,
        d.row_num
    FROM 
        generate_series(
            CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '6 days',
            CURRENT_DATE,
            '1 day'::interval
        ) WITH ORDINALITY AS d(ts, row_num)
)
SELECT 
    ad.day_name,
    dd.avg_response_time_ms,
    dd.count_logs,
    CASE 
        WHEN ad.day_name = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'Day') THEN 'Today'
        ELSE NULL
    END AS day_type,
    ad.row_num
FROM 
    all_days ad
LEFT JOIN 
    daily_data dd ON ad.day_name = dd.day_name
ORDER BY 
    ad.row_num;
